TEXT.S:
Poland
u Poland sa i labu nu Europe, itiza i 52 00 N, 20 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 312,685 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 304,255 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 8,430 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 38,523,261. kakalukan umah sa 48.20%, kilakilangan umah sa 30.60%, zumaay henay umah sa 21.20%.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Warsaw.
kakininan nu kanatal demiadkakining nu kanatal demiad sa 3 bulad 5 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Andrzej Duda, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 8 bulad 6 demiad.
likisiPolanda niyaduan idawtu ku maluayaway a tademaw tayda itida mueneng. nika, aydahay a Polanda binacadan u kakawsan nuheni sa namakayda i siyun nu ayawan pitu a lasubu nuitidaay a tademaw ci Sise-laa tademaw. 200341125 tusa a malebut idaw ku tulu (2003) a mihcaan sepatay a bulad, IndiaPakistannina tatusaay a kanatal masasakamu patahekal tuni ka lingatu ani kasa kamuan , sabaw tu cacay a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku lima a demiad pasaluimengen nuheni mikuwan tuni kalpacaw. 966 siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku enem (966) a mihcaan Masekeise milayap tu kilisetukiw (tinsukiw) a kiwkay, u Polandmala kilisetu a sinciaan. nina aydaay a Polandkatukuh aydaay a Ayelanpalecaden nu kitakit a tinsukiw a kilac nu satalakaway a kanatal. 12800. sabaw tu tusa a se-ci malingatu, itepalay nu Sen-cen Roma ti-kuoanika icelang, Polandwan-kuo ahican caay piales tu Cuo-o Europea lala' kiya haw, pasaida midiput tu Tun-o Euripeadidiay a Luo-se kunkuo, sisa masasu ada'tu micapi tu walu a lasubu a mihcaan itida i Tun-o Europeani kasasuadaan. 13. cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu a seci nu cuoye Mongoliapasaida i nutipan midebung tu Poland, Mongoliadi-kuodebunga nuheni ku Cuo-ya Asiaa kanatal atu Luo-se kun-kuonikudan debungen nuheni ku Poland.
nika uyniyan u Mongoliaitini i Europea kitidaan misa ahebal tu tanengay a kitidaan, Leakenikamalepacaw henay Polandatu tiwdun'maka subauay a mapulungay masakaputay a hitay hiyan nu Mongoliaahitay mamim apatayan. 1260-1280 cacay a malebut tusa a lasubu enem a bataan (1260) a mihcaan - cacay a malebut tusa a lasubu walu a bataan (1280) a mihcaan demecen naca nu sasepatay a kanatal nu Cincena kanatal misawacu, sisa nai'satu ku laheci nu Poland. 14. cacay a bataan idaw ku sepat (14) saci, Polandatu Sensnluomadikuoalaw masasu kapah tu. nika Polandhaymaw satu miliyas tu Cuo-o Europe, malatatengaay tu nu Tuo-o Europea kanatal. 13~14. cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (13)- cacay a bataan idaw ku sepat (14) a seci Polandatu biyaw a kanatal Litaw-wan-ta-kun-kuoamelik patiden tu masakaputay a kanatal, nina tusaay a kanatal sawsawni itini i hunsemalalaluma'an. sadikuday satu Poland Lithuaniademecen nuheni ku masasuaday nu Cincehankanatal. . miliyas atu Mongoliaa tademaw nika sasungaay, alan nuhani ku Mumkutadana tademaw mala O-lu Europea satabakiya nu kanatal. 1618200. cacay a bataan idaw ku enem katukuh katukuh tu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu a seci, nina tatusaay a kanatal palacacayen nu heni tu Poland Lithuaniaa kanatal, sisa nikaydaan nuheni makaala tu tusa a lasubu a mihcaan ku sakapahay satalakaway a zutay, milihida tu waliyan ni palekalan a E'luosesahunkanatal kinapina a malepacaw.
atu Ottomankanatal a nikalepacawan itinisatu Poland Lithuaniamala atu Spaina kanatal Sensnluomadikuo, Ottomankanatal, malecad atu Europenu sepatay a saicelangay nu kanatal. 18-. cacay a bataan idaw ku walu nikudan a seci, Poland Lithuaniapulu nu kanatal kalamkam a malawcu, itini i Sensnluomadikuoa kanatal a Awtilia kanatal, Puluse wankuoatu Polandnu ada' nuheni tu Russiakanatal nu tuluway a kanatal kina tulu kunuheni mibenis sisa malawpes satu kiya kanatal . 200 namakayda malingatu nu tusaay a lasubu a mihcaan Cuo-Polandhaymaw sa malawpes, haymaw satu liyawliyawsa a laecus. 1683 cacay a malebut enem a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku tulu (1683) a mihcaan, Polandkuowan ladayen nuheni ku hitay midebung amilepacaw tu Awtilinu Tuecia hitay, midiput tu O-cuo Europeanikakapah, pangangan han tu Wiyenaani kalepacaw han. 19. cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa a seci, ci Napoleonese mademec nikalepacaw satu, Polandnu hatidaay tu a lala' nu Russiakanatal Sahuna lala, nika Russiaa kanatal kina cacayan a bataan a bulad a malepacaw. 191811 Polanditinitu i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918 ) a mihcaan cacay a bataan idaw ku cacay a bulad misiteked tu kunuheni, patideng tu pulung nu kanatal, isulit nu likisi Polandu sakatusa a pulung nu kanatal.
sakaudip(1989),GDP19932000. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku siwa a mihcaan (1989) nu nikudan, Polandnu Soviet lekeca awayway nu kiyaku a sakaudip pasaida i iciba nunipi sumad, GDP itini i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tulu (1993) a mihcaan katukuh tu tusa a malebut (2000) a mihcaan macunus kunika tanayuan mucelak. 2001 nika katukuh tu tusa a malebut idaw ku cacay (2001) a mihcaan kanatal adidi kumi cakaya tu cancanan mawada' atu kitakit nu sakaudip cacelakan mahaymaw ku kangdahan, Polandnu sakaudip anika cunus nikatanayu haymaw satu caaycelak. milihida satu Europe a malasacabayay, sakaudip nuheni kalamkam satu mucelak a kapah. 199021 Polandnami siteked satu, namakay i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan (1990) a mihcaan mapalekal masumad, micidak i tusa a bataan idaw ku cacay (21) a saci nuayawan nu pina a mihcaan, Polanditini i Europesakae'timan han kaadihan tu nu katuuday, sisa alaw a mala Europe a malasacabayayun sakalalima a sakasiidaay.
sasinguan nu Poland87.5%5% Poland87.5 a kilac a tademaw u tinsukiw ku yadahay, duma satu nu lima a kilacan (5%) a tademaw u Orthodox a kiwkayatu kilisetu a baluhay nu kiwkayan. ayda han adiditu ku mitesekay tu tinsukiw a lalay nu lisin.
amica kunisulitan tu ilikisi nadebungan nu Polanda Puluseatu Russiamanglay mipenec tu tinsukiw, nika icelang ku sinku nu Polanda tademaw misuayaw tu tinsukiw.
i-su'Polandni sikian tu aadihan itini i kanatal mamelawan nu katuuday nu singanganay, itini i suotu Warsawidawku nu kitakitay a sayaway nu bayu a sinbung nipatideng a puowkun.
itini i tusa (20) a seci lima a bataan (50) a ziday, itini i kuncen anikuwanan, sifu misuayaw tu nalimaan ansangaan anipikawan misaadidi'aca', u sibung hantu mala pakunida sananay a sasakamuen nu kakawaw. 20"" katukuh tu sabaw tu tusa a seci, Polandanipatidengan a kacudu nu singbung ka ngada han nu katuuday, sakatinengan u " misakainai' tu kulit atu micidekay a kulit, alesen nuheni ku amisay a nalimaan a dadan".
